title: v1 Copy Changes - Key Generation, Storage
body:
# Problem

Current key generation screens conflate the public chat key with all keys.
Password encryption is not explained in light of having just created keys, your true point of access. 

## Implementation

Without adding significantly more text to these screens, inform users that in fact there are multiple keys, and one of them is for chat and requires you to choose a name.

Bring in some explanation of the password as it relates to keys.

Note - there's a sneaky loading screen somewhere that says `Processing`. It would be great if we could change that to `Just a moment`.

cc @hesterbruikman @errorists @corpetty - on second thought, I decided it was best to leave private/public distinction out of these screens. It was too heavy for onboarding. We can explain more concepts in glossary ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è(and of course, improve these later)

## Acceptance Criteria

Match copy in [this PDF](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1TkYfhKbb5sKUfFILQyrZMRwK5BEntpK4/view?usp=sharing) exactly.
